title: Was National Stockpile Website Edited After Jared Kushner’s Comments?
subtitle: On April 2, 2020, Jared Kushner said of the federal stockpile: "It's supposed to be our stockpile. It's not supposed to be states' stockpiles that they then use."
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Text on a government website for the Strategic National Stockpile was altered after Jared Kushner's remarks during an April 2020 press conference.
